main.bio: I am B.Tech ECE student. I am Web developer in making. I have good command over frontend as well as backend web development languages such as HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JS, React, Node.js, Express.js, PHP, Mysqli, MongoDB.

testimonials.text: Excellence is not a gift, but a skill that takes practice. We do not act ‘rightly’ because we are ‘excellent’, in fact we achieve ‘excellence’ by acting ‘rightly.’

With the support of our vibrant web developer community and dedicated partners, our goal is to level the playing field and usher in an explosion of content and services that will meet the diverse needs of the next two billion people online.
